Tunable.name: BlurRadiusScaler_0
Tunable.description: controls the global size of the blur radius, small means less blurry, big means more blurry but with risks of pixel separation

Tunable.name: BlurRadiusScaler_1
Tunable.description: controls the global size of the blur radius, small means less blurry, big means more blurry but with risks of pixel separation

Tunable.name: EnableDof
Tunable.description: Turn On or Off the whole effect

Tunable.name: FarBlurDist_0
Tunable.description: max blur will be experienced for anything with Z greater than Far Blur Distance, Far Blur Distance must be greater than Max Focus Distance, blur will increase for meshes when their depth increase from Max Focus Distance to Far Blur Distance

Tunable.name: FarBlurDist_1
Tunable.description: max blur will be experienced for anything with Z greater than Far Blur Distance, Far Blur Distance must be greater than Max Focus Distance, blur will increase for meshes when their depth increase from Max Focus Distance to Far Blur Distance

Tunable.name: FarBlurStrength_0
Tunable.description: controls how blurry something farther than the focus zone can get, between 0 and 1, 1 means max blur

Tunable.name: FarBlurStrength_1
Tunable.description: controls how blurry something farther than the focus zone can get, between 0 and 1, 1 means max blur

Tunable.name: MaxFocusDist_0
Tunable.description: the scene will be sharp for everything in between Min Focus Distance and Max Focus Distance, note that Max Focus Distance can be equal to Min Focus Distance but can't be less

Tunable.name: MaxFocusDist_1
Tunable.description: the scene will be sharp for everything in between Min Focus Distance and Max Focus Distance, note that Max Focus Distance can be equal to Min Focus Distance but can't be less

Tunable.name: MinFocusDist_0
Tunable.description: the scene will be sharp for everything in between Min Focus Distance and Max Focus Distance, note that Max Focus Distance can be equal to Min Focus Distance but can't be less

Tunable.name: MinFocusDist_1
Tunable.description: the scene will be sharp for everything in between Min Focus Distance and Max Focus Distance, note that Max Focus Distance can be equal to Min Focus Distance but can't be less

Tunable.name: NearBlurDist_0
Tunable.description: max blur will be experienced for anything with Z less than Near Blur Distance, Near Blur Distance must be less than Min Focus Distance, blur will decrease for meshes when their depth increase from Near Blur Distance to Min Focus Distance

Tunable.name: NearBlurDist_1
Tunable.description: max blur will be experienced for anything with Z less than Near Blur Distance, Near Blur Distance must be less than Min Focus Distance, blur will decrease for meshes when their depth increase from Near Blur Distance to Min Focus Distance

Tunable.name: NearBlurStrength_0
Tunable.description: controls how blurry something in front of the focus zone can get, between 0 and 1, 1 means max blur

Tunable.name: NearBlurStrength_1
Tunable.description: controls how blurry something in front of the focus zone can get, between 0 and 1, 1 means max blur

Tunable.name: NumBlurPasses
Tunable.description: controls how many times we perform the separated horizontal/vertical dual pass filtered gaussian blur - will increase achievable blur level at extra GPU cost

Tunable.name: NumKeysToUse
Tunable.description: controls how many times keys should be used, 1 or 2 at the moment, more could be added

Tunable.name: ZoomValue_0
Tunable.description: The camera zoom value these params will be used for or interpolated from

Tunable.name: ZoomValue_1
Tunable.description: The camera zoom value these params will be used for or interpolated from
